originalText.text: We have 2 cats and we always hire Throw Me A Bone for cat sitting every time we travel. The staff is always friendly, efficient, very organized and they take great care of our cats! We can always book services with the click of a button through their website and easily get confirmation for the visits, and they always post pictures and a detailed visit update. It gives us great peace of mind to know that our cats are in good hands when we're away!

text.text: We have 2 cats and we always hire Throw Me A Bone for cat sitting every time we travel. The staff is always friendly, efficient, very organized and they take great care of our cats! originalText.text: The folks over at Throw Me A Bone are the absolute best when it comes to taking care of one of our most valuable assets in life - Our pets!  They are highly professional, qualified, attentive, trusting and courteous.  They completely understand the needs and concerns of us humans when we need to be away from our homes and provide an array of services at very competitive rates.  I am 100% confident and relaxed whenever I work with these guys and you will be as well!

originalText.text: I have been using Throw me. Bone for a couple of years now. I can’t say enough about their service and commitment. I’m out of town in Colorado now and there was a small issue with my cat. They were all over it. Even over the weekend. They are caring, obviously love animals, and very committed to making both the owner and the pet happy and healthy. I’m so grateful to them and I highly recommend them to anyone who loves their pet .

originalText.text: We have used TMAB a handful of times and each experience has been wonderful. I think their prices are very competitive for NYC and the level of care is outstanding. Most of the time we have 2 amazing ladies, Yairin and Lesley, who do an amazing job and sent great reports but the rest of the staff is great too! It's nice to know our cat is cared for at the level we care for him when we are away. Thank you TMAB!

originalText.text: We absolutely LOVE TMAB! They are very reliable, always coming during their time slot, and my little dog loves them. They leave detailed messages and pictures, which are so fun to receive. Living in a city our schedules are always changing and we sometimes need a walk at the last minute. TMAB always accommodates us and fits us in. They are truly the best!
